definition[0]: a long and difficult journey, made especially on foot as an adventure
example[0]: a lonely trek through the forest
definition[1]: a distance that seems long when you walk it
example[1]: I’m afraid it’s a bit of a trek to the station.
definition[2]: to make a long and difficult journey, especially on foot
example[2]: The elevator was broken, so we had to trek up six flights of stairs.
definition[3]: to walk a long way, especially in the mountains, as an adventure
example[3]: For five days he trekked across the mountains of central China.
